headline: Lumos CEO to retire
summary: HIGH POINT — Internet service provider Lumos on Friday announced the upcoming retirement of CEO Brian Stading and the promotions of two of its executives. The moves are part of what the company terms a planned transition designed to further its growth strategy and expansion priorities for its fiber broadband network. Lumos, which has a substantial presence of customers and employees in the ...
